snippet: Mr. McMullin, a former C.I.A. official and a Mormon, has missed ballot-access deadlines in dozens of states but could take crucial votes from Donald J. Trump in Utah....
abstract: Evan McMullin, former CIA official and Mormon, says his disdain for Donald J Trump is inspiring him to run for president as independent candidate; is backed by former Mitt Romney donor and could affect outcome in heavily Mormon state of Utah.
lead_paragraph: Mr. McMullin, a former C.I.A. official and a Mormon, has missed ballot-access deadlines in dozens of states but could take crucial votes from Donald J. Trump in Utah.

headline.main: Evan McMullin, Anti-Trump Republican, Mounts Independent Presidential Bid
headline.print_headline: Former C.I.A. Official to Challenge Trump With an Independent Presidential Bid

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Mormons (Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints)
